DOC.brief_summary: To highlight the incidence of adverse reactions of Qingkailing Injection.
DOC.brief_title: Hospital Intensive Monitoring of Adverse Drug Reactions of Qingkailing Injection In The Next Two Years
DOC.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
DOC.criteria: all the patients treated by Qingkailing Injection in the certain centers(hospitals) in the next 2 years. in accordance with ethics requirements.
